author: Azario Lopez
title: Silent Hill 2 Developer Bloober Team Reveals New Sci-Fi Survival Horror Game “Cronos: The New Dawn”; Trailer Streaming Now
text:
Bloober Team, the developers behind acclaimed titles like Layers of Fear , Observer , The Medium , and this year’s Silent Hill 2 remake, have announced a new sci-fi survival horror game titled Cronos: The New Dawn . Set to release in 2025, the game will be available on PlayStation 5 , Xbox Series X|S, and PC via Steam .
Cronos: The New Dawn marks Bloober Team’s first original intellectual property in the survival horror genre, representing a significant step forward for the Polish studio known for redefining horror experiences. The announcement comes shortly after the release of their Silent Hill 2 remake, showcasing the team’s continued dedication to the genre.
“Following the success of Silent Hill 2 , we are proud to present Cronos , an exciting new IP from Bloober Team,” said Piotr Babieno , CEO of Bloober Team. “Our commitment to redefining the horror genre continues with this survival horror title, which represents a natural progression of our creative vision and our studio’s strategy. By merging the eerie atmosphere of horror with the boundless potential of science fiction, Cronos promises to deliver a fresh survival experience. We can’t wait to share it with the world in 2025.”
Set in a twisted time-travel narrative, Cronos: The New Dawn takes players to an unforgiving post-apocalyptic future in 1980s Poland. You assume the role of a Traveler , an agent of the enigmatic Collective , tasked with extracting selected individuals who didn’t survive the apocalypse from the past.
To fulfill the Collective’s mission, players must navigate a deadly wasteland created by a cataclysmic event known as the Change . The environment is filled with monstrous abominations that will test combat abilities and survival skills.
We’ll keep you updated on the development of Cronos: The New Dawn.
